0: We felt pampered because of the attentive and friendly staff the beautiful rooftop pool and restaurant area and all the free stuff provided every day wi fi internet snacks coffee soft drinks and newspapers
However this aside a great hotel lovely wine bar and great roof top bar and pool
From the rms to the roof top pool is great and San Diego has a lot to see
Rooftop pool is fantastic and the service it great
The breakfast outside was perfect and the rooftop pool looked incredible
The rooftop pool and bar make this hotel a must stay
Otherwise the rooftop was nice the pool was okay the lobby was fun and the hotel is more modern and nice compared to surrounding properties
1: Rooftop pool is nice but oddly the rooftop bar does not stay open past 7
The pool is average size and lovely to lounge around
The bar and pool on the roof were very nice and I particularly enjoyed the fire pit in the colder evenings
Roof garden is an excellent choice for dinning swimming or just taking a drink
The bar swimming pool and fire pits provide an extra ambience with all the amenities of an outdoor lounge
Pool area was bijou but very nice with fab rooftop bar area which was really busy at the weekend
During the day you can swim in the rooftop pool and or go workout at the 24hour gym
The pool is a nice size for being in the city but everything around it feels cramped
2: 50 day valet was way overpriced especially when the pool rooftop was unavailable most of the time we were there due to events
The pool in the website looked bigger than actual
Although disappointingly we were told that the Rooftop pool was closed to hotel guests for a private event
Since our stay was so short we were not able to check out the rooftop pool bar or dine at the on site steak house

The lighting situation was abysmal it took forever to get hot water at the sink the pillows were not great understatement the sleeping and sitting areas were not fully divided the pool area backed onto the highway very noisy
But the seating at the pool is limited very tiny deck area
The pool had a private event on a weekend day and was too crowded for guests to use
It has a swimming pool and a gym which are not big but serve their purposes
The hotel is very close to the restaurants and bars but do n’t forget to visit the roof to bar and swimming pool
